meanings.definition: The quality or style of being exaggerated, theatrical, or humorous in an intentionally artificial or extravagant way.
meanings.sent1: The movie's campiness made it a fun and entertaining watch.
meanings.sent2: The play had just the right amount of campiness to keep the audience engaged.
meanings.sent3: The campiness of the comedy show had everyone laughing out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a perfect blend of elegance and campiness.
meanings.sent5: The campiness of the circus performance left a lasting impression on the children.

meanings.definition: The use of exaggerated or theatrical elements in a performance or work of art.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting stood out due to its unique campiness.
meanings.sent2: The director's films were known for their campiness and bold visuals.
meanings.sent3: The campiness of the play added a touch of whimsy to the production.
meanings.sent4: The campiness of the costume design transformed the characters on stage.
meanings.sent5: The campiness of the music video perfectly complemented the song's upbeat vibe.
